text: is a Japanese manga series written by LINK and illustrated by Kotaro Shōno. It began serialization in Shueisha's digital magazine Shōnen Jump+ in May 2016. An anime television series adaptation is scheduled to premiere in 2021. == Plot == In the year 2040, Reito Mizuhara is suffering from a rare disease and is put into cryostasis while waiting for a treatment to save his life is developed. Five years later, Reito awakens and learns that while he was asleep, the world was struck by the MK (Man Killing) Virus that caused the death of almost every male human in the planet, with only a few surviving ones being put in cryostasis. Much to his surprise, Reito learns that he is one of five males in Japan who somehow developed immunity to the MK Virus and is forced to take part in a breeding program to ensure mankind's survival. While Reito investigates the secrets surrounding the MK Virus and the mysterious disappearance of his girlfriend, Elisa, the series also shows the perspective of the other men who developed immunity to the MK Virus, each with their own circumstances. ==Media== ===Manga=== World's End Harem is written by LINK and illustrated by Kotaro Shōno. It started on Shueisha's digital magazine Shōnen Jump+ on May 8, 2016. In May 2020, it was announced that the first part of the manga reached its climax. The first part of the manga finished with its 85th chapter on June 21, 2020. The manga has been compiled into individual tankōbon by Shueisha. The first volume was published on September 2, 2016. As of May 13, 2020, eleven volumes have been released. Seven Seas Entertainment announced the acquisition of the manga in October 2017. It is being published under its Ghost Ship imprint for mature readers. ====Spin-offs==== A spin-off series, titled World's End Harem: Fantasia started in Shueisha's Ultra Jump on April 19, 2018. Another spin-off, titled World's End Harem: Britannia Lumiere, started on Shōnen Jump+ and Manga Mee app on June 26, 2020. ====Volume list==== |} ===Anime=== In May 2020, it was announced that the series will receive an anime television series adaptation.
